headline: ASML Holding Q4 Earnings Miss Expectations, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: ASML posts Q4 earnings miss despite 4.9% Y/Y revenue growth, with EUV-driven Systems sales offset by weaker Services and higher costs.

raw.headline: ASML Holding Q4 Earnings Miss Expectations, Revenues Rise Y/Y

headline: Analog Devices Pushes Grid Intelligence While Governance And Valuation Questions Grow
summary: Analog Devices (NasdaqGS:ADI) is investing in Sense to speed up grid edge intelligence and energy management solutions. The company is reshaping its Board, adding AI and robotics expert Dr. Yoky Matsuoka and preparing for the retirement of long-time director Susie Wee. Shareholders have filed a proposal seeking stronger rights to call special meetings, signaling rising engagement on governance topics. Analog Devices sits at the intersection of semiconductors, sensing, and signal processing,...

headline: Susquehanna Sees AI Infrastructure Boost Supporting Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) Outlook
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 20 Most Profitable Stocks of the Last 20 Years. Analog Devices, Inc. is placed fifteenth on our list of most profitable stocks. TheFly reported on January 22 that Susquehanna raised its price target on ADI to $360 from $350 while maintaining a Positive rating. The update came as part of the firm’s […]

headline: Is Analog Devices (ADI) One of Goldman Sachs’ Top Semiconductor Stock Picks?
summary: Analog Devices (NASDAQ:ADI) is among Goldman Sachs’ top semiconductor stock picks. On January 16, 2026, TD Cowen raised its price target on Analog Devices (NASDAQ:ADI) to $355 from $285, citing the company’s strong positioning in industrial markets and growth across subsegments such as automated test equipment and aerospace and defense.
